io.textile.textile

Class Textile

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.textile.textile.Textile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver

    public class Textile
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver
    Provides top level access to the Textile API

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String repoPath,
                              java.lang.String seed,
                              boolean debug,
                              boolean logToDisk)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize the shared Textile instance with an existing account seed
        Parameters:
        repoPath - The path to the Textile repo
        seed - The account seed
        debug - Sets the log level to debug or not
        logToDisk - Whether or not to write Textile logs to disk

        java.lang.Exception - The exception that occurred
